resources.string: # \# Basic plugins\n\nShows basic usage of plugins
# \# LaTeX\n\nShows how to display a **LaTeX** formula
# \# Custom extension\n\nShows how to create a custom extension to display an icon referenced in markdown as `@ic-android-black-24`
# \# Recycler\n\nShow how to render markdown in a RecyclerView. Renders code blocks wrapped in a HorizontalScrollView. Renders tables in a custom view.
